title: Skinny bread and butter pudding - low calorie
ingredients: ['10 slices wholemeal bread, cut diagonally', '30g demerara sugar', '60g raisins or sultanas', '30g dried apricots, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon grated nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon or ground ginger', '2 large free-range eggs', '350ml skimmed milk']
